Incapacitated

Source: XPHB, page 369

While you have the Incapacitated condition, you experience the following effects. You can't take any Action|XPHB|action, Bonus Action|XPHB, or Reaction|XPHB.Your Concentration|XPHB is broken.You can't speak.If you're Incapacitated when you roll Initiative|XPHB, you have Disadvantage|XPHB on the roll.
